name: 07-multi-db
description: ``` docker run \     --name postgres \     -e POSTGRES_USER=renatosiqueira \     -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=minhasenhasecreta \     -e POSTGRES_DB=heroes \     -p 5432:5432 \     -d \     postgres ``` ``` docker ps docker exec -it postgres /bin/bash ``` ``` docker run \     --name adminer \     -p 8080:8080 \     --link postgres:postgres \     -d \     adminer ```
